# u-oauth-text

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                           | Type                       | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | --------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of text to display: "title" for application name, "description" for application description. | `"description" \| "title"` | `"title"` |
